text: Violence is the use of physical force to cause injury, damage or death. Violence may also refer to: ==Music== *Vio-lence, a thrash metal band *Violence (Nothingface album) *Violence (Editors album), 2018 * The Violence (album) * Violence (song), a song by Grimes and i o *"Violence", a song by Against Me! from their album Searching for a Former Clarity *"Violence", a song by Blink-182 from their self titled album *"Violence", a song by Mott the Hoople *"Violence", a song by the Pet Shop Boys that appears on the albums Please and Very (2001 rerelease) ==Other uses== * Violence (book), a 2008 book on social theory by Slavoj Žižek * Violence (film), a film noir from 1947 * Violence (role-playing game), a role-playing game by Greg Costikyan * La Violencia, a 10-year civil war in Colombia
title: Violence (disambiguation)
